title: Bug 16205StyledText  Tab does not tab out of readonly
description: Build 20020515 Help / About select a portion of the about text (this is a readonly StyledText) hit Tab it does not go to the next controlSince Tab has no effect on the StyledText content since it is readonly, itshould do tab traversal.Note that we are working around this post 20020515 by using a traverse listener.If this is fixed, please let us know so we can remove this workaround.
